amendment.description: To add a provision relating to extension and agricultural research at 1890 land-grant colleges.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3323 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3323 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Brown to Amendment SA 3224. (consideration: CR S4713-4716; text: CR S4715-4716) To add a provision relating to extension and agricultural research at 1890 land-grant colleges.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3323 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Brown to Amendment SA 3224.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3323 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
